copy-file

Function

Summary

Creates a copy of a file.

Signature

copy-file old-file new-file #key if-exists => ()

Arguments

old-file
An instance of <pathname>.

new-file
An instance of <pathname>.

if-exists
An instance of
<copy/rename-disposition>. Default value: #"signal".

Values

None

Library

system

Module

file-system

Description

Copies old-file to new-file. If new-file already exists, the action of this function is controlled by the value of if-exists. The default is to prompt you before overwriting an existing file.

See also

<copy/rename-disposition>, page 161

rename-file, page 172

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
